mapper.select: select * from user where id = #{id} and password = password(#{password})
mapper.update: update blog set title = #{title}, logo=#{logo} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select a.no as no,a.name as name,a.id as id,a.description as description,a.reg_date as regDate,ifnull(b.post_count, 0) as count from category a left join (select category_no, count(*) as post_count from post, category where post.category_no=category.no group by category_no) b on a.no = b.category_no where a.id = #{id}
select min(no) as no from category where id = #{id}
